subject: Cases of permissions
text: HTrf <cfl <TTTHT xifeaFuT PHONE 91-11-5074100/5074200 (ev waav &r <Tun TAT) Fax 91-11-50935071 5093514 Extn. 2223/2318/2468 /2553 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport & Highways) G-5 8 6_ SECTOA.10 , DWAFKA_ NEW DELKI-11004S No. 11041/21/2002/Admn. III January 13, 2003 POLICY MATTERS-ADMINISTRATIONFINANCE (33/2003) Sub: Cases of Permissions NHAI / MoRT&H accords   permission fro various purposes which include (a) permission for access to main carriageway for retail outlets or private properties (b) permission for underground laying of cables_ 'pipelines etc. (c) permission for advertisement along the highways, installation of overhead signages/ arch / grounded road signages etc. 2 Corridor Management Division had so far been dealing with all the cases 0f such permissions whether these related to a corridor handed over to the Corridor Management Division Or not. In the case of corridors still under the control of Technical Divisions, references had to be made to these divisions, which resulted in delays in granting permissions. 3 It has been , therefore, decided that henceforth Corridor Management Division will deal with only such corridors which have been transferred to the Corridor Management Division. Rest of the cases will be dealt with by the respective Technical Divisions 4_ This issues with the approval of the Competent Authority. 8. 4ac Gnallkou (S.Loganathan) General Manager (Administration) 1 All Members/ CGMs/ CVO / CPD 2 All GMs/DGMs/ Managers 3) All PDs of PIUs / CMUs to: 1_ PS to Chairman 2.
